action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains a collection of Tetris-like blocks in various colors. There are seven distinct shapes, each in a different color: purple, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and dark purple. The shapes resemble the Tetris game pieces known as Tetriminos. Each shape is composed of four squares, arranged differently to form the following Tetriminos: T, Z, L, O, S, I, and J. The background is white.
continue

There are seven distinct shapes, each in a different color: purple, red, orange, yellow, green, blue, and dark purple. The shapes resemble the Tetris game pieces known as Tetriminos. Each shape is composed of four squares, arranged differently to form the following Tetriminos: T, Z, L, O, S, I, and J. The background is white.
